Content: There should be FTL-inhibitors that make FTL travel in a certain
medium sloer or impossible around them. They may be detectable or
non-detectable, natural or artifical, permanent or temporary (think
FTL-storm). If a ship enters the influence of a non-detectable
inhibitor preventing FTL travel completley it may be forecd down to
sublight speed, flung away from the inhibitor or destroyed depending on

the medium and inhibitor.
Some FTL-inhibitors should be able to
discrimiante based on the owner of the passing craft.
